## FlyoutButton class

Class for a button or label in the flyout.  Blockly.FlyoutButton

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class FlyoutButton 
```

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `FlyoutButton` class.

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [height](./blockly.flyoutbutton.height.md) |  | number | The height of the button's rect. |
|  [info](./blockly.flyoutbutton.info.md) |  | toolbox.ButtonOrLabelInfo |  |
|  [TEXT\_MARGIN\_X](./blockly.flyoutbutton.text_margin_x.md) | <code>static</code> | number | The horizontal margin around the text in the button. |
|  [TEXT\_MARGIN\_Y](./blockly.flyoutbutton.text_margin_y.md) | <code>static</code> | number | The vertical margin around the text in the button. |
|  [width](./blockly.flyoutbutton.width.md) |  | number | The width of the button's rect. |

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [createDom()](./blockly.flyoutbutton.createdom.md) |  | Create the button elements.  The button's SVG group. |
|  [dispose()](./blockly.flyoutbutton.dispose.md) |  | Dispose of this button. |
|  [getButtonText()](./blockly.flyoutbutton.getbuttontext.md) |  |  Text of the button. |
|  [getTargetWorkspace()](./blockly.flyoutbutton.gettargetworkspace.md) |  | Get the button's target workspace.  The target workspace of the flyout where this button resides. |
|  [isLabel()](./blockly.flyoutbutton.islabel.md) |  |  Whether or not the button is a label. |
|  [moveTo(x, y)](./blockly.flyoutbutton.moveto.md) |  | Move the button to the given x, y coordinates. |
|  [show()](./blockly.flyoutbutton.show.md) |  | Correctly position the flyout button and make it visible. |
